title: Phumzile Matyhila
text: Phumzile Matyhila (born 2 September 1975) is a South African <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202000%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20flyweight">men's light flyweight</a> event at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a>.
